trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Vallejo
There were no other sightings in Vallejo on or around August 12th 2012
Summary: I have seen strange lights in the sky over Marin County every night fot past week.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my living room and saw a Triangular light formation. I just looked up and saw lights that didn't look stars. When I looked through my binoculars I could see that the left bottom light was blinking red and blue lights.
